page.title: 12Codsall Middle School Sports
page.content: Thursday 4th.July 1985. It's our sports day. The competitors from our class make their way onto the field. Me and the other non competitors follow after an anxous five minutes wait. Lots of parents are seated on chairs across the field. The atmosphere is electric as the boys line up for the first race.The starter's gun sounds and the boys start running around the specially cut grass track. Everyone is chanting,shouting and cheering. Then all of a sudden everyone disappears from around me. They've noticed that the tuck shop has opened. Eventually the boys pass over the finishing line and everyone starts to clap. Another few races pass until only the relay is left. The runners line up. BANG, they're off, running round the track faster than greyhounds. A massive uproar sounds as out team cross the line. We've won sports day !
